## HttpRequest class

Wrapper of a http get request

```typescript
declare class HttpRequest 
```

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [request(url)](doc/markdown/./base.httprequest.request.md) |  | Send a GET request. |
